AutomationNode.description: The `AutomationNode` schema describes a node that carries out instructions in industrial automation environments.
AutomationNode.longDescription: This resource shall represent an automation node for a Redfish implementation.

enumDescriptions.ConditionStop: The node's controller has stopped due to a condition fault.
enumDescriptions.Done: The node's controller has reached its destination position.
enumDescriptions.ErrorStop: The node's controller has stopped due to an error.
enumDescriptions.Waiting: The node's controller is waiting to start.

title: #AutomationNode.AutomationNode
